  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, Point ballPos)
      construct for class Wall which initialize and set values for startPoint, levels, ballCount, area it also initializes a random speed for ball for every new level
      Parameters:
      drawArea - Rectangle GameFrame where game is rendered/drawn
      brickCount - number of bricks in wall(30)
      lineCount - lines of bricks in wall(3)
      brickDimensionRatio - width-to-height ratio of a single brick
      ballPos - position of ball(300, 430)

  • Method Details

    • makeBall

      private void makeBall(Point2D ballPos)
      Construct a new rubber ball
      Parameters:
      ballPos - position of ball (300, 430)

    • getHighscore

      public String getHighscore()
      Read a line from highscore.txt and insert into variable highscore
      Returns:
      String highscore

    • checkScore

      public void checkScore()
      to check whether player's score is higher than current highscore

    • resetScore

      public void resetScore()

    • findImpacts

      public void findImpacts()
      it checks all sorts of impacts, and carry out subsequent action checks if player green bar is impacted by ball check if brick are impacted until broken checks if ball impacted the border of gameFrame check if ball is lost by going out of bounds

    • impactWall

      private boolean impactWall()
      for switch case condition, it finds the direction of the brick where the ball impacts it then it rebounds the ball in reverse direction
      Returns:
      False if the brick is broken, then call impact method and return brokenFlag

    • impactBorder

      private boolean impactBorder()
      check if ball impacts border of gameFrame
      Returns:
      True if the ball goes beyond the left or right edge of the gameFrame

    • ballReset

      public void ballReset()
      it resets the position of player bar and ball it then resets the direction of ball movement, and ballLost to false

    • wallReset

      public void wallReset()
      it restores all the brick it also reset the ballCount to 3 again

    • nextLevel

      public void nextLevel()
      it goes to the next level, and it also restores the brickCount back to 31

    • move

      public void move()
      player and ball move

    • hasLevel

      public boolean hasLevel()
      returns True if there is level remaining (4 levels in total)
      Returns:
      boolean True or False
